title: 3D Printed Bracelets
description:
I designed intricate lattice-like wraparound bracelets in Rhino, considering printability and the material qualities of photosensitive resin.

One piece bracelets must have enough flexibility to bend onto the wrist. After many tests of micro- and macro- geometries, these two designs resulted. With each, the overall structure wraps comfortably while the lattice diamonds bend just enough to afford global deformations without breaking.
